mapper.select: select movieCd, m.movie_title, imgpath, price, cinema_place, DATE_FORMAT(t.time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS time, theater_num from movie m, time t where m.movie_title = t.movie_title and time_idx=#{time_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into time (cinema_place, movie_title, time, theater_num) values ( #{cinema_place}, #{movie_title}, #{datetime1}, #{theater_num} )
